snippet: The French luxury goods group LVMH, the world’s biggest maker of luxury goods, posted a 3 percent rise in like-for-like first-quarter sales.
abstract: LVMH, the world’s biggest maker of luxury goods, posts 3 percent rise in like-for-like first-quarter sales.
lead_paragraph: The French luxury goods group LVMH, the world’s biggest maker of luxury goods, posted a 3 percent rise in like-for-like first-quarter sales.

headline.main: A Weaker Euro Helped Lift First-Quarter Sales at LVMH
